questions.question: What is 'Autopay' in modern banking?
options: A robot that pays for your groceries
A system that automatically pays bills on the due date
A way to print your own money
A manual bank transfer made at a branch
questions.explanation: Autopay es un sistema que paga automáticamente las facturas recurrentes en su fecha de vencimiento.

questions.question: Which sentence correctly expresses a future intention or plan?
options: I am going set up a direct debit.
I going to set up a direct debit.
I am going to set up a direct debit.
I am go to set up a direct debit.
questions.explanation: La estructura gramatical para intenciones futuras es: be (am/is/are) + going to + verbo base.

questions.question: What does 'Paperless Billing' mean?
options: Paying with physical cash
Receiving statements digitally instead of on paper
Having no money in the bank
Writing checks by hand
questions.explanation: La facturación sin papel (paperless) consiste en recibir facturas por email o app para ahorrar papel.

questions.question: If a payment is marked as 'Overdue', it means:
options: It was paid too early
The amount is too high
It was not paid by the due date
It is a free service
questions.explanation: 'Overdue' significa que el pago está vencido o atrasado respecto a su fecha límite.

questions.question: Choose the correct negative form for a future plan:
options: They not going to cancel the subscription.
They aren't going to cancel the subscription.
They don't going to cancel the subscription.
They isn't going to cancel the subscription.
questions.explanation: Para formar el negativo, se añade 'not' después del verbo 'to be' (are not = aren't).

questions.question: What is a 'Subscription' service in the digital economy?
options: A one-time purchase of a car
A regular payment for continuous access to a product or service
A government tax on income
A physical signature on a document
questions.explanation: Una suscripción implica pagos recurrentes a cambio de un servicio continuo (como Netflix o Spotify).

questions.question: What is the primary function of a 'Smart Meter'?
options: It measures how fast you walk
It automatically records and sends energy usage data to providers
It counts the physical coins in your wallet
It translates bank documents into different languages
questions.explanation: Un medidor inteligente registra el consumo de servicios (luz, gas) y envía la lectura automáticamente.

questions.question: Which question is grammatically correct?
options: Am you going to pay the bill?
Are you going to pay the bill?
Do you going to pay the bill?
Is you go to pay the bill?
questions.explanation: En preguntas con 'going to', el verbo 'to be' (Are) va antes del sujeto (you).

questions.question: What is a 'Billing Cycle'?
options: A bicycle used by bank employees
The interval of time between two consecutive billing statements
The time it takes to print a physical check
A type of recurring loan
questions.explanation: El ciclo de facturación es el periodo (usualmente mensual) que cubre cada factura.

questions.question: Which of these is a typical 'Recurring Payment'?
options: Buying a coffee at a cafe once
A monthly rent payment
Selling an old phone online
Finding a $20 bill on the street
questions.explanation: Los pagos recurrentes son aquellos que se repiten con una frecuencia fija, como el alquiler.

questions.question: Complete the intention: 'We ______ to switch to green energy next month.'
options: is going
are going
am going
be going
questions.explanation: El pronombre 'we' requiere la forma plural del verbo to be: 'are'.

questions.question: What does 'VAT' stand for in an invoice?
options: Virtual Account Technology
Value Added Tax
Verified Asset Transfer
Variable Annual Time
questions.explanation: VAT (Value Added Tax) es el impuesto al valor agregado (IVA) aplicado a bienes y servicios.

questions.question: Identify the grammatically correct sentence for a future plan:
options: He's going to monitoring his expenses.
He's going to monitor his expenses.
He going to monitor his expenses.
He's go to monitor his expenses.
questions.explanation: La estructura correcta es: be + going to + verbo base (monitor).

questions.question: What are 'Utilities' in a household or business context?
options: A set of tools for home repair
Basic public services like water, gas, and electricity
The profit made from an investment
A type of high-interest savings account
questions.explanation: Las 'utilities' son los servicios públicos básicos necesarios para el funcionamiento de un local o vivienda.

questions.question: In the sentence 'I'm going to pay by app', what does 'going to' indicate?
options: A past action that finished
A future plan or intention
A habitual action in the present
A prohibition or rule
questions.explanation: 'Going to' se utiliza para expresar planes, intenciones o predicciones con evidencia.

questions.question: If you cancel a subscription today, are you ______ to pay next month?
options: not going
going not
no going
not go
questions.explanation: La forma negativa correcta para el futuro de intención es 'not going to'.

questions.question: What is the best action if a bill contains an error?
options: Pay it immediately and forget it
Ignore it and wait for a fine
Contact the service provider to dispute the incorrect charge
Close your bank account immediately
questions.explanation: Ante un error, se debe contactar al proveedor para corregir la factura antes del pago.

questions.question: Correct the error: 'I going pay my utility bills today.'
options: I am going to pay my utility bills today.
I going to pay my utility bills today.
I am go pay my utility bills today.
I go pay my utility bills today.
questions.explanation: Falta el verbo 'to be' (am) y la preposición 'to' para completar la estructura 'be going to'.

questions.question: What is a 'receipt' or 'invoice' used for?
options: A document that serves as proof of a transaction or payment
A request for a personal loan
A type of debit card for kids
A form to report a stolen car
questions.explanation: Un recibo o factura es el documento que comprueba que se realizó una compra o pago.

questions.question: Which time expression is commonly used with 'going to'?
options: Yesterday afternoon
Next month
Two years ago
Last night
questions.explanation: 'Next month' (el próximo mes) es una expresión de tiempo futuro, ideal para planes.
